attributes.additional_details:
To restrict the use of anonymous browsing of user profiles on social media or professional social media on professional sites such as linked in.
These sites are allowing unknown users or agencies to browse peoples personal details anonymously having been requested by many users to desist in allowing such practices .which allow professional  people to be tracked harassed or generally intimidated by unknown persons or agencies .
There is in existence a campaign to stop such activates which linked in is ignoring for its own interests whether commercial or otherwise not known
Such reference would be
http://www.linkedin.com/groupItem?view=&item=5852535000418762752&type=member&gid=6577480&trk=eml-b2_anet_digest-null-2-null&ut=22cZfpTA3wsmc1
